phrases: Umaru-chan, you are number one again?
Umaru-san, I will not lose next time.
Sylphyn kept it pretty simple today.
Well, what is more important is summer vacation, which starts tomorrow.
I am so psyched for it.
Now that our tests are over, I am totally going to let loose.
The same as usual, I guess.
Summer vacation: the time when I can stay at the arcade
all morning long without being bothered, while the masses are busy working.
I will take full advantage of this right as a student.
All I do is sit here dropping tokens.
But that is why it is so great.
I would recognize that back anywhere, UMR-san!
Do you wear your mask in private, as well?
I have some unfinished business with you, UMR-san.
You see, I have a classmate named Doma Umaru-san.
My mission in life is to defeat Umaru-san.
Before that, I will win against you, UMR-san,
We shall play some Supe IV.
I did not bring my personal controller today.
I shall defeat you in this game you were just playing.
Why am I playing a coin game with Sylphyn-san?
Er, it is a chance for you to get more coins.
I have never seen that happen before!
Uh, I would not exactly call it winning...
I shall give this to you.
Now, let us play another game.
This is a blessing from God!
Now that I look at this game more carefully, it is all just about luck!
No, this game is about probability, where there is an expected value...
We will settle things with another game!
We have played so many games and still have not settled anything.
Well, they are all games that I am good at.
Um, I am not sure why you want to win so badly,
but I think an arcade is a place for enjoying games.
Rivals become friends after a victory.
You will join forces with me, and we shall defeat Umaru-san.
Wh-Why and how am I supposed to help?
I have not the slightest, but you are going to help me!
Man, it is summer, all right.
Would not you say there is nothing better in summer than sitting
in a well-air-conditioned room and playing My Summer?
Master, I shall make more Calpis.
Ah, I would like mine with a ratio of 7:3.
Kirie-chan's so good at taking care of me, I am becoming a worse person.
Heck, I am fine with becoming worse.
Let us enjoy summer even more.
I wonder what people living in the outside world are doing right now.
I heard that it is hotter than 35 degrees Celsius outside.
But I am in my nice, cool room, drinking Calpis.
She is so comfortable, she fell asleep.
I-I want to keep the memory of this adorableness in my hands.
I will use my cellphone camera...
I just could not help myself...
Master, is not this the best summer?
How do you all take your baths?
but what I am about to show you is how I usually take my baths.
Ice cups, potato chips, a manga magazine, and a waterproofed gaming console.
Because I am so busy, I bring my games to the bath.
As a gamer, I cannot let even a second go to waste.
Also, it may seem like an odd match to eat potato chips in the bath,
but I can eat them without worrying about my hands getting messy.
While my game is loading, I can read my Jumpu.
Ice eaten while bathing is just...
If you do not do your homework, no potato chips and cola for you.
I can feel all of the stress of the day draining away.
I want to put a lot more in,
but the last time I used a lot, I got yelled at.
I am going to keep an eye on this so you will not waste it.
The bubbles envelop my whole body!
When I am in the bath, time goes by slower and slower.
It gets hot, I cannot breathe,
Drinking cola after waiting until my utmost limit is the best!
I have got to drink my coffee milk right after my bath, too.
The amount of laundry is ridiculous since I can only do it on my day off.
Man, it takes forever to get a lot of gold in social network games these days.
Bribes will not work on me.
You do not have a lot of clothes to wear outside, do you?
so why do not you invite Ebina-chan and Kirie-chan and go shopping?
If I had this much in gold, I would be invincible...
Do not buy anything other than clothes.
I am so happy you invited me to go shopping with you.
Thank you very much for inviting me out toda
Your clothes are so frilly and cute, Kirie-chan!
Looks like Kirie-chan still does not like Ebina-chan...
What kind of clothes do you guys want to look at?
I want to look at cute clothes.
Man, there are so many shops in heah...
Which shop should we look at?
Let us take a look around, and buy whatever we like most last.
I could buy 60 colas for the price of this piece of cloth.
Can I help you find anything?
Oh, we are just looking around...
Are you a model or something?
What brands do you usually wear?
Solid colors are pretty popular right now.
Is actually just looking at Umaru
Hey, I think this would look good on you, Umaru-chan.
Ebina-chan is always so meek, and yet she is so sharp right now.
Ah. Um... K-Kirie-chan, did you find anything?
They are still a bit rigid with each other...
since you are both here, you two should try on some clothes, too.
Okay, let us go buy the things we liked,
and meet back up here in an hour.
Now, I will go get that dress I saw at the first shop.
Do not buy anything other than clothes.
Do not buy anything other than clothes...
Do not buy anything other than clothes...
You do have more clothes now, but they all seem kind of dull.
Onii-chan, solid colors are really popular right now.
How long are you going to act like it is summer vacation?
I guess it is true that you only realize how precious something is once you have lost it.
My summer vacation... and Onii-chan, too.
Stop saying depressing things and eat your breakfast.
Could you even eat that right after waking up?
It is already the usual time that Ebina-chan's waiting for you.
If you understand, hurry up and eat...
Bomber, we just got to the office.
Yeah, I usually get a boost in the afternoon.
Could I ask for your assistance?
I am in my panties, but I am not embarrassed!
No, it is my little sister...
No, seriously, do not worry about it.
What do you think is for dinner tonight?
Can you eat that right after waking up?
I have to do the preview by myself this time!
We did finish using all the
What will we do after this week?
Just get the director or Sankaku Head-sensei.
